packages/ui/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}: npm run lint:types --workspace=@astral/ui && npm run lint --workspace=@astral/ui
packages/icons/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}: npm run lint:types --workspace=@astral/icons && npm run lint --workspace=@astral/icons
commander/**/*.{js}: npm run lint:types --workspace=@astral/commander && npm run lint --workspace=@astral/commander
